i think that there is no need for users to worry about their personal information being exposed on twitter as the company takes great care to protect all user data and does not share it with any third party without explicit consent. additionally, the platform provides options for users to control what information they want to share publicly or privately, ensuring that only authorized persons can access certain details.</s> 
what measures are in place to ensure that personal information is protected from unauthorized access?</s>
